Description:
The report is destroyed after change the dimension position[1102]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070413-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a cross tab with two dimensions and one measure such as
Dimensions: PRODUCT(PRODUCTTYPE->PRODUCTNAME)
            REGION
Measures: QUANTITY
Crosstab:
           PRODUCTTYPE       
           PRODUCTNAME
   REGION| QUANTITY    
2, Specify grandtotals on each dimension
3, Drag the dimension REGION into the column area
4, Drag the dimension PRODUCT into the row arae.

Expected result:
The changing will be successful
Actual result:
The NPE throws out and the report is destroyed, if reopoen the report, it is invalid.
Error log:
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3499)

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 182517 ***
